snippet.title: Deep Sea Sweep - an ocean platformer where you get rid of filthy treasure chests!
snippet.description:
The game I'm currently developping, Deep Sea Sweep 
You can try out the demo on steam for free.

It's a 2D platformer where you keep cycling between free movement and being affected by gravity while you carry heavy objects.
